sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ad( adindex, email, name, userid, phone, service, ment, rdate, status ) VALUES ( ad_seq.nextval, '$email$', '$name$', '$userid$', '$phone$', '$service$', '$ment$', sysdate , 'P' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT adindex, userid, service, ment, sdate, edate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, banner, status, email, phone, name FROM ad WHERE userid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT adindex, userid, service, ment, sdate, edate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, banner, status, email, phone, name FROM ad WHERE adindex = #adindex# ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b
